article_title: Opponents to birth control win legal victory
article_text:
There is a new twist in the ongoing U.S. legal debate over whether birth control can be a required as part of an insurance plan.

Opponents of an “abortion pill mandate” under the Affordable Care Act – also known as “Obamacare” – recently won a legal victory after the U.S. Court of Appeals for the 8th Circuit basically ruled they deserve their day in court to present their case.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Ed Silverstein
article_metadata.description: There is a new twist in the ongoing U.S. legal debate over whether birth control can be a required as part of an insurance plan.
